009package Ch13_ColorImages;
010
011import java.awt.image.ColorModel;
012import java.awt.image.IndexColorModel;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018
019public class Brighten_Index_Image implements PlugInFilter {
020        
021        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
022                return DOES_8G + DOES_8C;       // this plugin works on indexed color images 
023        }
024
025        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
026                ColorModel cm =  ip.getColorModel();
027                if (!(cm instanceof IndexColorModel)) {
028                        IJ.error("Color model not of type IndexedColorModel");
029                        return;
030                }
031                
032                IndexColorModel icm = (IndexColorModel) cm; 
033                //IJ.write("Color Model=" + ip.getColorModel() + " " + ip.isColorLut());
034        
035                int pixBits = icm.getPixelSize(); 
036                int nColors = icm.getMapSize(); 
037                
038                //retrieve the current lookup tables (maps) for R,G,B
039                byte[] rMap = new byte[nColors]; 
040                byte[] gMap = new byte[nColors]; 
041                byte[] bMap = new byte[nColors];
042                
043                icm.getReds(rMap);  
044                icm.getGreens(gMap);
045                icm.getBlues(bMap);  
046                
047                //modify the lookup tables      
048                for (int idx = 0; idx < nColors; idx++){ 
049                        int r = 0xff & rMap[idx];       //mask to treat as unsigned byte 
050                        int g = 0xff & gMap[idx];
051                        int b = 0xff & bMap[idx];   
052                        rMap[idx] = (byte) Math.min(r + 10, 255); 
053                        gMap[idx] = (byte) Math.min(g + 10, 255);
054                        bMap[idx] = (byte) Math.min(b + 10, 255); 
055                }
056                
057                //create a new color model and apply to the image
058                IndexColorModel icm2 = new IndexColorModel(pixBits, nColors, rMap, gMap, bMap);  
059                ip.setColorModel(icm2);
060        }
061
062}
063
